A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her training, the girl meets a charming aristocrat who offers to support her in her sporting ambitions. His mother, on the other hand, is against the girl and in the end the steed has a great race.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, which he spent intensively reading books, and his young adulthood in Chicago, which proved to be a formative experience.
